Generated_Summary: [' Franklin Delano Roosevelt. Roosevelt: The world knows it has lost a heroic champion of justice and freedom. Tragic fate has thrust upon us grave responsibilities. Original_Summary: In this address to Congress at the Capitol in Washington, D.C.., Truman honors the memory of recently deceased President Franklin D. Roosevelt.
